subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN4688 is on the way
description_text:
I am writing to formally complain about an order that has still not been shipped after 33 days. 
 This delay is completely unacceptable. Since the order has not been dispatched within a reasonable time, I hereby demand a full refund of the amount paid, effective immediately. 
 In addition, I require a written confirmation that this email has been received, along with confirmation of when the refund will be processed. 8. jan. 2026 kl. 12:49 skrev SIMSONN <service@simsonn.com>: ﻿
 
 







 
 Your order is on the way 
 
 
 
 


 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 SIMSONN
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 Order #SSN4688
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Your order is on the way 
 Your order is on the way. Track your shipment to see the delivery status. 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 View your order 
 
 
 
 
 
 or Visit our store
 
 
 


 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 Other tracking number: SF5127346994154
 
 



 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Items in this shipment 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 



 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 

 Simsonn HS Pro Shifter the H/SQ Dual-Mode Racing Simulation Shifter × 1 

 

 
 
 


 

 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 



 
 


 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 If you have any questions, reply to this email or contact us at service@simsonn.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Eyvind Nødland,     We sincerely apologize for the delay. Due to demand far exceeding expectations, this item has been out of stock for nearly two weeks. We have confirmed your order was shipped yesterday. Below is your tracking link:  https://www.sf-international.com/gb/en/support/querySupport/waybill?No=SF5127357869709
